ai_tools.description: Artificial Intelligence(AI) related tools and applications

anonymizers.description: Enables anonymous surfing to other websites. Users may be trying to bypass web filtering or other purposes.

authentication_services.description: Services that help authenticate users with login and password.

beauty.description: Fashion or glamour magazines, beauty, clothes, cosmetics, and style.

botnets.description: URLs, generally IP addresses, that are most likely part of a Bot network and are used to launch malware attacks. These attacks include: SPAM messages, DOS, SQL injections, proxy jacking, and other contacts.

business.description: Corporate websites and content that is related to economics, marketing, and business management

business_systems.description: Sites and apps that are used primarily for businesses. For example, CRMs.

cdn.description: Content Delivery Networks - Delivers content and data to third parties, including: ads, media, files, images, and Content Delivery video.

chat_and_im.description: Real-time messages, instant messaging, and chat services over the Internet. Also includes chat rooms.

cheating.description: Related to academic cheating including: school essays and papers, copies of exams, plagiarism, and so on.

computers_and_technology.description: General knowledge related to computer and technical information. Also includes SaaS and sites that deliver Internet services.

criminal_activity.description: Content that explains how to carry out illegal activities, including crimes, intellectual and copyright violations, etc...

cults.description: Content related to interpreting, or influenceing real events through supernatural means including: astrology, spells, curses, magic powers, satanic, and supernatural beings. Also includes horoscope sites.

database.description: Database applications such as MySQL, MsSQL, MongoDB, etc...

dem.description: Socket Synthetic Probes used for DEM

dns_over_https.description: DNS over HTTPS protocol and usage

drugs.description: Content related to illegal, controlled, or abused drugs, such as: heroin, cocaine, and other street drugs. Also includes information on 'legal highs', such as: glue sniffing, misusing perscription drugs, and abusing other legal substances.

education.description: Training and trade schools, including: online courses, vocational training, software training, and skills training.

entertainment.description: Motion pictures, videos, television, music and programming guides, books, comics, movie theatres, galleries, artists or reviews on entertainment. Performing arts (including: theatre, vaudeville, opera, symphonies, and so on). Museums, galleries, artist sites, sculpture, photography, and so on.

erp_and_crm.description: Apps that are used for ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) and CRM (Customer-relationship management)

file_sharing.description: Online storage and file sharing web sites and applications.

finance.description: Banking services and other types of financial information, such as loans, accountancy, actuaries, banks, mortgages, and general insurance companies. Does not include sites that offer market information, brokerage or trading services.

food_drinks_tobacco.description: Content that promotes, or supports the sale of alcoholic beverages, or tobacco products and associated paraphernalia.

gambling.description: Online gambling, lottery, casinos, and betting agencies.

games.description: Computer or other games, information about game producers, or how to obtain cheat codes. Content about game-related publications.

gen_ai_business_operations.description: AI systems that optimize workflows, automate processes, and enhance decision-making for businesses.

gen_ai_code_assistants.description: AI-powered tools that assist in writing, debugging, and optimizing code across different programming languages.

gen_ai_conversational_ai.description: AI systems that engage in natural, human-like dialogues to answer questions, provide information, or perform tasks.

gen_ai_healthcare.description: AI solutions that support medical diagnosis, patient care, and administrative tasks in the healthcare industry.

gen_ai_media_generators.description: AI applications that create or edit media content, including images, audio, video, and graphics.

general.description: Content that is a regular part of typical Internet surfing, including: research, kids, legal, and society

government.description: Content that is maintined by governmental or military organizations, departments, or agencies, including: police departments, fire departments, customs bureaus, emergency services, civil defense, counterterrorism organizations, and public hospitals.

greeting_cards.description: Allows people to send and receive a wide variety of greeting cards over the Internet.

hacking.description: Sites that promote or advise about computer hacking to gain unauthorized access to proprietary computer systems. Activities include: stealing information, perpetrating fraud, creating viruses, or illegal activities related to stealing digital information.

health_and_medicine.description: Information about health, healthcare services, fitness and well-being. Includes information about medical equipment, hospitals, drugstores, nursing, medicine, procedures, prescription medications, and so on.

hiring.description: Information about job listings, careers, job searches, resume writing, interviewing tips,  employment agencies or head hunters.

ot_protocols.description: Communication protocols used in industrial control systems and operational technology (OT) environments.

suspected_unwanted.description: Sites and apps that are known to be compromised in the previous 12 months.
